issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: The ti.admob does not function in the latest update (ti.playservices)

comments.body:
Hi [~andreas.pingas], What version of ti.admob module did you use? Please share test case that reproduces the issue so we can replicate on our end and investigate.

Thanks!

android-4.4.0

{code:java}
var win = Ti.UI.createWindow();

win.open();

var Admob = require('ti.admob');

var PlayServices = require('ti.playservices');

var ad = Admob.createView({
    height:400,
    adType:Admob.AD_TYPE_BANNER
});

win.add(ad);
{code}

Hello [~andreas.pingas], Can you get back to us on the status of your issue?
I have tested it with SDK 8.0.1 version 11.0.40  and it works properly. With the version 16.1.2 does not work.
